'''''Even Caesar Could Not Buy This From Me''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must pick up [[A Painting Left For You]] from [[Mamere]]'s house after the completion of {{Quest|In the Wake of Narcissus}}.

==Trivia==
* The name and the Spanish localization of this achievement is likely a reference to {{w|Matthew 22:21}}. When questioned whether the Jews ought to pay taxes to the Romans, Jesus responded, "Render unto Caesar the things that are Caesar's, and unto God the things that are God's"
